channel.title: CVE Feed for Elastic -- Elastic APM .NET Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elastic -- Elastic APM .NET Agent

item.title: CVE-2021-22143|2024-08-03T18:37:16.702Z -- elastic -- elastic%20apm%20.net%20agent
item.description: The Elastic APM .NET Agent can leak sensitive HTTP header information when logging the details during an application error. Normally, the APM agent will sanitize sensitive HTTP header details before sending the information to the APM server. During an application error it is possible the headers will not be sanitized before being sent.
